message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really value. I'm offering it to you for $95.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $75 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $87.50. This is a fair offer considering its worth to both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
